bug.author: codecolony
bug.description: Hi, I have built 4.0 version from 4.0 branch but version file mentions 5.0.0-alpha. Can someone please clarify what is wrong here? Thanks and Regards, codec

comments.comment: Please respect guidelines for posting issue: use tesseract user forum for asking questions/support.
master branch is 5.0.0-alpha. If you need 4.ox, clone 4.1 branch

The file in the 4.0 branch was indeed wrong. I now fixed it in commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/commit/c69859cacb040a518cd64206ab1a2d6e48d17854>c69859c</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/codecolony>@codecolony</denchmark-link> , thank you for reporting this.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/stweil>@stweil</denchmark-link> Thanks a lot for clarifying. Appreciate your effort.
